citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 PM on 2/12/25.
The inspector arrived at 1:45 PM on 2/12/25 to conduct an inspection. The inspector went to the office of the designated
facility representative upon arrival but no one was there, and then tried to contact them by phone and text. It was learned
that the facility representative was at a distant off-site location and was not available today.
This is the first attempted inspection of the research facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records
for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 PM on 2/12/25. 
 
The inspector arrived at 1:45 PM on 2/12/25 to conduct an inspection. The inspector went to the office of the designated 
facility representative upon arrival but no one was there, and then tried to contact them by phone and text. It was learned 
that the facility representative was at a distant off-site location and was not available today.  
 
This is the first attempted inspection of the research facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records 
for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
